page.title: 05Getting up on a school day
page.content: Every school day my brother creeps in and wakes me up at 7.25. When he has woken me up he makes a pain of himself, he pretends to die all over the place and we have an argument. When it is summer I dress myself in summer clothes but in the winter I wear school uniform. Then I go downstairs to have some breakfast, I always have Frosties. I like them because when I am sleepy they refresh me. I have a cup of tea with sugar in. Then I make sure I have got everything in my bag for school. After that I brush my teeth and wash my face. I always go to mum to have my hair tied back. At 8.25 I go out and feed my rabbits, I give them oats, dandelions and water. They are always hungry and come to the door to see me. At 8.30 I play the piano for ten minutes.
